answers.answer: I thought I had it bc I had swollen feet at 16 weeks but my doctor said if I did have it I would be really sick like in bed type of sick but also my blood work is fine
Well my mom had it through out all four of pregnancies And sometimes my blood pressure goes sky high out of n no where, so I asked my doctor to do a EKG to test me for it

question: Any of you ladies had it? If so how'd you find out and what did doctor do? I'm 36w baby#4 first boy. And went to have a glucose test last week and all of a sudden this week I'm getting calls from nurses saying that there's lots of  protein in my urine. I have really high blood pressure and my iron is extremely low. And it's possible that I have gestational diabetes. Now thisis baby #4 and none of this stuff has ever happened to me. So I'll be in the hospital all day tomorrow getting tests done.
title: preclampsia??
